member.name: T:Hack.io.YAZ0.YAZ0
member.summary: Class containing methods to compress and decompress Data into Yaz0

member.name: M:Hack.io.YAZ0.YAZ0.Decompress(System.String)
member.summary: Decompress a file into a memorystream

member.name: M:Hack.io.YAZ0.YAZ0.Decompress(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Decompress a byte[] into a memorystream

member.name: M:Hack.io.YAZ0.YAZ0.Compress(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.param: If true, takes shorter time to compress, but is overall weaker then if disabled (resulting in larger files)

member.name: M:Hack.io.YAZ0.YAZ0.Check(System.String)
member.summary: Checks a given file for Yaz0 Encoding
member.returns: true if the file is Yaz0 Encoded
